text: Sarku Japan is an American-Canadian quick serve restaurant chain. It focuses on Japanese cuisine. It was founded in 1987. It has grown to include over 180 locations in 32 states across the country, as of September 2021. The vast majority of the chain's restaurants are located in shopping mall food courts. Category:American fast food restaurants Category:Canadian fast food restaurants Category:1987 establishments in the United States
title: Sarku Japan
